name: Aurora Stardust
occupation: Guardian of the Celestial Twilight Isles
backStory: Aurora Stardust is a skilled sorcerer of elven heritage, born under the twilight sky that shrouds the Celestial Twilight Isles. From a young age, she displayed a natural affinity for manipulating the mystical energies that flow through the land. As the darkness began to spread, threatening the balance of the world, Aurora took on the responsibility of becoming the Guardian of the Isles. Her mission is to uncover the ancient secrets hidden within the floating islands and harness their power to push back the encroaching shadows. With her courage and wisdom, Aurora aims to bring light and hope back to her homeland.
